item.description:
What: The Harvest Festival at Alphalpha Farm in Topsfield. There will be live music by the Swamptones, Tours of the Vineyard, children's activities, and wine tasting (21+ only)

Where: At Alphalpha Farm on the patio

What you need to know: There is a $10.00 admission for the wine tasting. Bad weather could cancel this event, so please check this site prior to heading out.

What to Bring: your camera, the meetup cellphone (978-304-2811) in case you get lost, running late or can't find us.

If you haven't paid your dues this year, please be prepared to pay them at this event. For those who have paid, thank you.

 

Hope to see everyone at the Vineyards

Janet & Donna
item.name: Harvest Festival & Wine Tasting @ Alphalpha Farm
